body: Finally, you can implement `prim::StringLiteral` in `operators.cpp` to just push an undefined tensor as a result. (It cannot reasonably be examined so it can be anything). Then all the components are in the right places for actual string support when we add it.
body_html: Finally, you can implement prim::StringLiteral in operators.cpp to just push an undefined tensor as a result. (It cannot reasonably be examined so it can be anything). Then all the components are in the right places for actual string support when we add it.
